Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as it is a spoof and not an actual announcement made by Starbucks CEO Kevin Johnson.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Starbucks has implemented a policy where patrons of color are allowed to move to the head of the line, which is not true.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Starbucks announced a revised policy where anyone who enters their spaces is considered a customer, regardless of whether they make a purchase.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the policy by stating that all patrons of color will be allowed to move to the head of the line at all locations, which is not true.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting a false statement as if it were true, causing confusion and misinformation.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim can be explained as a spoof or meme created in response to the racial controversy surrounding Starbucks in 2018.
